entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 08:30 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016

Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %

Wind: S 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Amount 10 mm except 20 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with snow this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 28 May 2016
